bill.summary: 11/6/1997--Introduced. Amends Federal aviation law to direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to require by regulation the installation of the TCAS-II collision avoidance system on certain large cargo aircraft whose maximum gross weight exceeds 15,000 kilograms.
